entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 01:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Wind: ESE 97 km/h gust 125 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning after midnight then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this evening then to 80 gusting to 120 except gusting to 160 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Freezing rain inland early in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 80 km/h gusting to 120 except gusting to 160 in the Wreckhouse area in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
